alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 10:45AM EST until March 01 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Fulton OH, Williams and Defiance Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio... Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Allen IN, De Kalb and Defiance Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tiffin River at Stryker. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood waters begin to affect some farm buildings near Stryker and flood some secondary roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EST Sunday was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 7.0 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
